name: Pink Man's Tag Demo
description:
Pink Man's Tag is a fun and enjoyable game for everyone to play! It's a suitable game for all agaes and teaches fun and happiness! Pink Man is the most loving, bubbly and kind person you'll ever meet!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to turn
  • Shift to sprint
  • Escape to exit (but why would you want to?)
Credits

Pink Man thanks the Pink Men that helps him out in making his game more fun for all! Pink Man also gives credit to the team behind Baldi's Basics, where the Pink Men gained a lot of inspiration from!
